vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the construction services contract with Chamberlin Dallas LLC to (1) initiate the first of two one-year renewal options; and (2) increase the contract for job order contracting services for waterproofing and roofing repairs, replacements, alterations, and improvements at City facilities - Not to exceed $1,000,000.00, from $4,000,000.00 to $5,000,000.00 - Financing: Capital Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the construction services contract with Chamberlin Dallas LLC to (1) initiate the first of two one-year renewal options; and (2) increase the contract for job order contracting services for waterproofing and roofing repairs, replacements, alterations, and improvements at City facilities - Not to exceed $1,000,000.00, from $4,000,000.00 to $5,000,000.00 - Financing: Capital Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
